official_title: Mindfulness Practice in Endometrial and Cervical Cancers With Smartphone Applications (MECCA)
inclusion_criteria:
* New diagnosis of either 1) endometrial cancer undergoing surgery or 2) cervical cancer undergoing chemo-sensitizing radiation
* Access to a smartphone
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 90 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Non-English speaking
* No access to smartphone
* Current use of Headspace application
